amendment.description: To add an amount of Army RDT&E funding for human tissue engineering, and to provide offsets within the same authorization of appropriations.

vote.text: Amendment SA 707 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 707 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Inhofe. (consideration: CR S6893; text as modified: CR S6893) To add an amount of Army RDT&E funding for human tissue engineering, and to provide offsets within the same authorization of appropriations.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 707 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 707 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Inhofe.
